etf.dotsandboxes.bb170011d.engine

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • etf.dotsandboxes.bb170011d.engine.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Implements the game loop and game logic Contains a thread of execution for the game loop Contains various methods regarding the game state, such as loading, saving, setting players, etc.

      • playMove

        private void playMove(java.lang.String move)
        Plays the move on the board. Changes the isEndOfMove game state Adds the move to the record of all moves in the current game
        Parameters:
        move - String representing the move to be played

      • offerPlayerMove

        public void offerPlayerMove(java.lang.String move)
        Offers a move to the active human player (if such exists) Should be called directly by the human player move listeners (GUI)
        Parameters:
        move - Move which the player will potentially play

      • run

        public void run()
        Contains the game loop. Gets the next move and plays it. Possibly waits on a move if activePlayer is a human player Should not be called directly
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
